option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# Dockerfile dla środowiska deweloperskiego z hot-reload
FROM node:22-alpine
WORKDIR /app
# Instalacja zależności COPY package.json package-lock.json* ./ RUN npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit
# Kopiowanie plików źródłowych COPY . .
# Expose portu EXPOSE 5173
# Zmienne środowiskowe dla dev ENV NODE_ENV=development
# Uruchomienie w trybie dev z hot-reload CMD ["npm", "run", "dev", "--", "--host", "0.0.0.0"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Docker Compose dla środowiska deweloperskiego
services: frontend: build: context: ./frontend dockerfile: Dockerfile.dev container_name: spcloud_frontend_dev restart: unless-stopped ports: - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-5173}:5173" volumes: - ./frontend:/app - /app/node_modules environment: - NODE_ENV=development - PUBLIC_API_URL=${PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:8000} depends_on: - backend networks: - spcloud_network
backend: build: context: ./backend container_name: fastapi_backend restart: unless-stopped env_file: .env ports: - "8000:8000" volumes: - ./backend/app:/app depends_on: - db - minio networks: - spcloud_network
minio: image: minio/minio:latest container_name: minio command: server /data --console-address ":9001" restart: unless-stopped environment: MINIO_ROOT_USER: admin MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: supersecret ports: - "9000:9000" - "9001:9001" volumes: - minio_data:/data networks: - spcloud_network
db: image: postgres:18 container_name: postgres_db restart: unless-stopped env_file: .env ports: - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432" volumes: - db_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data networks: - spcloud_network
volumes: db_data: minio_data:
networks: spcloud_network: driver: bridge

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Dockerfile dla środowiska deweloperskiego z hot-reload
FROM node:22-alpine
WORKDIR /app
# Instalacja zależności COPY package.json package-lock.json* ./ RUN npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit
# Kopiowanie plików źródłowych COPY . .
# Expose portu EXPOSE 5173
# Zmienne środowiskowe dla dev ENV NODE_ENV=development
# Uruchomienie w trybie dev z hot-reload CMD ["npm", "run", "dev", "--", "--host", "0.0.0.0"]

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
